expected_behavior: Agent dispatches to Theme mode (Mode C) via tokens sub-dispatch
Agent scans for hardcoded color values (hex, rgb, hsl) across .tsx, .jsx, .css files
Agent organizes found values into three token layers: primitive, semantic, component
Agent generates @theme {} block with organized CSS custom properties
Agent uses oklch color space for color manipulation
Agent flags contrast-color() as experimental with manual fallback
Agent audits directional properties and suggests logical property equivalents
